snippet: Ping An Insurance Group Co of China Ltd, China's second-largest insurer by market capitalisation, said it planned to raise HK$36.8 billion ($4.75 billion) in a private placement of its H-shares....

headline.print_headline: China's Ping An Insurance to Raise $4.75 Billion in Placement of H Shares
headline.main: China's Ping An Insurance to Raise $4.75 Billion in Placement of H Shares

lead_paragraph: Ping An Insurance Group Co of China Ltd, China's second-largest insurer by market capitalisation, said it planned to raise HK$36.8 billion ($4.75 billion) in a private placement of its H-shares.
